title: Why do I feel bored often? I don't know what to do and what interests me. - Quora

response.answer_text: People often get bored that's a human nature which is completely natural. So here is few points which i wanna share that might help you: Start mingling with people sometime when we talk with People we learn new things from them and that might excite you as well. So start meeting new people.Start thinking about new hobbies like swimming , dance , reading books etc.. sometime we need to force our body to learn new things. So that we kill our boredom.Most important thing stop thinking that noting interest you n all. Every day when you get up set your mind that you gonna learn new things today..Please keep one thing in mind.. before doing anything you need to set your mind. That is very important.. your body will start working once your mind is set..
